name: InBalance Resort
address: Jl. Lotus, Dencarik, Kec. Banjar, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 81152, Indonesia
review 1: We recently spent 4 nights at this resort and all I can say is WOW!  An absolutely beautiful part of Bali.  The resort is stunning.  Our room was right on the beach and the pool.  It was clean, tidy and the outdoor bathroom was a highlight.  The staff were fantastic.  Daily activities were organised for us,  and the meals were fantastic.   We also loved Snobby the pug dog.  We really hope we can come back one day.  Thank you to Esther and the wonderful team that took care of us.
review 2: Perfect place to escape the hustle and mayhem of the south. Our room was really clean, bed was super comfy as well. Unfortunately we didn‚Äôt get to meet the owners as they were away but we were graciously welcomed by Esther who went out of her way to get my girlfriend medication and had it back at our doorstep within 10 minutes of our request! The rest of the team and chefs were very hospitable and prepared us a lovely seafood dinner right on our patio on our last night here. Highly recommended!
review 3:
Very nice resort, pool and staff. The beach is not really a swimming beach. Bring surf shoes as the rocks have sharp shells.
The real downside is the distance to Lovina. They offer a shuttle for 200k round trip or you can rent a scooter for 150k. Traffic in Lovina is not usually too bad. Takes 15min to get into town.
review 4:
This is a piece of paradise! We loved our stay here so much. Our villa was the one right by the beach and pool and absolutely gorgeous, both the bedroom and open bathroom.

The owner Paul was so sweet to us, took us to the city by car one evening and even helped me out with some medicine when I got sick. We love his pug and we made friends with a cute, pregnant feral kitty.

We have to say the photos don't do this place justice, it really is wonderful!

The only thing we would change was a bit more variety at the hotel restaurant when it comes to vegetarian/vegan meals ‚ù§Ô∏è
review 5: Nothing bad could get said about Inbalance except that we didn't stay long enough. The staff were fantastic especially Aster and Ayu. The restaurant is open for all meals and we're delicious. You can't get closer to the beach if you tried. The pool is perfect. The beds comfy. And it's only 5 mins from several little tokos, warungs and mini marts. Hope my husband keeps his promise to stay a week in June ‚ù§Ô∏è

name: Villa Lotus Estate
address: RX9G+4MQ, Dencarik, Banjar, Buleleng Regency, Bali 81152, Indonesia
review 1: Recomended for stay vacation front of the villa is beautiful beach n the villa really calm n peace place
review 2:
Omg.   So beautiful... And huge.

Nice view.  Pool .. good service.  Friendly staff.

You have to come and stay in this villa.  Sure you will looooooove it
review 3: Villa ist hudge, some years old. Already time shows their work, great location and feeling here. Able to host up to 10 guests, recommend this for max. 8
review 4: Nice villa at the beach, clean,friendly staff and good cook/food. Just 10-15 minute from the lovina centre.

name: The Villas North Bali
address: Jalan Tulip L3, Temukus, Kec. Banjar, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 81152, Indonesia
review 1: Excellent location. Long strect of beach with large area of shallow water, great for family with kids. Sand has black color coming from a volcanic history of this region, but the water is clean and warm. A decent size infinity pool with a sun deck and lounge chairs, surrounded by a flowery garden,  is good for some lap swimming and sun bathing. 2 beatiful large dining areas overlooking out to the ocean and gardens. The 'fairy' sight at night time by the pool/beach and garden is accompanied by the soothing sound of the waves nearby increase the romantic quality of this villa. 2 large kitchens with gaz stoves and fridgs. Appliances and utensils  are old but functional. 5 bedrooms can easily accommodate a group of 10 people. Recommend the package of services that includes a team of three local cooks, a gardener/security person providing tasty breakfast and dinner. Local market is opened in the morning for the adventurous (call and rent a motor bike if prefer), otherwise a western like grocery store (Pepito) is 15 minutes distance on bike. Not much night life around here but excellent location for rest and relaxation (isolated enough, but not too far from basic need and services).
review 2:
I love how quite this villa, with only the sound of the waves. So peaceful. As someone from the south of Bali, which full of noisy area and all the hustle and bustle. This place is really perfect for me.

The staff is really friendly and helpful. They prepare amazing balinese meals during my stay. Love it.
review 3: Absolutely enjoyed ourselves here last year in February... Will defttry to get back there soon... Wonderful staff wonderful surroundings peaceful and quiet...
review 4:
Not so many words to say, just - it is wonderful place to stay and to live.
We lived there 10days with family and was absolutely happy and feel like at home.
Stuff very kindly.

Thanks Paul for support us.

Hope see you again.

One disadvantage: villa is to big to stay for one family. You should take your friend also and stay with big community).
review 5: What a wonderful place. Perfect setup and staff. All the rooms are well furnished with top quality items. Fully air-conditioned with the choice of indoor or outdoor living. The staff are very friendly and willing and able to help. Fully Covid safe.

name: Villa Asmara
address: Jl. Tulip P1, Dencarik, Banjar, Buleleng Regency, Bali 81151, Indonesia
review 1:
We had a wonderful four days at villa Asmara with Kadek, Nila and the team. The house is beautiful to relax and the kids had a great time in the giant pool! More importantly the staff made this a beautiful experience for us.Kadek and Nilas cooking is delicious, Aan always had the table set lovely, Dewa keeps the garden like a dreamy oasis and we always felt safe with made and junior (not that you need to worry) because everyone is so kind. We also got a massage from susee and it was the best one I had while in Bali! We look foward to coming back with friends again one day. Thank you so much to you all.

Kate and Pat-Australia
review 2: A dream comes true. Not only the building is very, vey nica and luxury but also the stuff is doing a great job! Having fresh-made dinner here with this great atmosphere is just perfect!
review 3: Fantastic villa with a beautiful see view! The owners are super friendly and the people working here are aswel! A real recommendation for when you are in north Bali or just Bali in general!
review 4: No words could justify how much we enjoyed while staying there. The Villa, the staff, the food, etc.... in fact, we enjoyed it so much, we return there again. ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
review 5: Super new and cool place to stay. Will be cared by Kadek and team. Had unforgettable super holiday here. Lovely decorated and very clean. Full Points

name: Villa Cantik
address: RX9H+73X, Dencarik, Banjar, Buleleng Regency, Bali 81152, Indonesia
review 1:
I had the most amazing stay at Villa Cantik. Super young child friendly, the garden is massive and the pool is refreshing. Having the beach right in front of the villa makes it even perfect. The staff were incredible. They made us the most authentic Indonesian food!

I can't wait to come back!
review 2: Very nice villa we stayed 3 night 4 days.  We all got a free massage. Villa staff were supper friendly and helpful. We asked to make breakfast and dinner for our whole stay. They cooked really yummy Indonesian food, as good as any local restaurants. If you want to try good homemade Indonesia food and not worry about your stomach, it is highly recommended that you ask the villa staff to cook.
review 3: This was one of our best stays ever! We spent three wonderful weeks here. The infinity pool is just amazing with a view of the sea. This luxurious villa has everything! The staff was really kind and took care of our needs.

name: Villa Rumah Rindu
address: Jl.Lotus M3, Dencarik, Kec. Banjar, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 81152, Indonesia
review 1: The staff were beautiful. Very kind. The rooms in the villa were not as advertised. There are 4 bathrooms only, not 5. 4 toilets and 4 showers. Also the first 2 bedrooms in the main house are lovely, but the other bedrooms are of a much poorer quality. The two bungalows are really only a single bedroom, as one of the  bungalows doesn't even have a dividing door and the rooms are very small. Also the bathroom is connected to one bedroom so the other bedroom occupant has to go into someone else's bedroom to go to the toilet. For the price, this is not a villa I'd book again. It is impossible to stay with a group without someone feeling they got short changed.
review 2: My family and myself stayed at Vila Ruma for 2 weeks in 2013 (Feb). This is during off season. The villa and accommodation are beautifull and well maintained. Staff did their best to fulfill our every need. There is a night watch who keeps an eye on the complex during night. Would definitely return here!

name: Villa Segara Murti
address: RX9G+943 Lotus, Jalan, Dencarik, Kec. Banjar, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 81152, Indonesia
review 1: Very very beautiful villa in the northern part of Bali. The owner and employees were super nice. Pool is big and there‚Äôs a whirlpool sitting comfortably next to it. If the weather permits, you can rent a boat and experience the dolphin viewing. Absolutely stunning!
review 2:
This villa is paradise! Amazing pool, spa and outdoor area. Inside bathrooms and rooms are a little old but still very comfortable.

The staff really make the holiday - they clean, drive you to wherever, help organise tours and cook you 3 meals a day, and are so lovely and friendly.

Lovina is a less visited part of Bali but this really adds to the charm - it‚Äôs very relaxing and peaceful. Segara Murti was a beautiful place to base yourself. Lovina is so underrated within Bali, the attractions and tours we visited were all fantastic (and generally quiet).

Snorkelling on Menjangan island is a highlight - don‚Äôt miss it. The villa staff can organise it all for you.
review 3: Quiet, beach front villa, clean, well organized landscape, strong Balinese architectur, humble, helpful, and hospital staffs

name: Villa Bunga Melati - Bali Beach Villa
address: Jalan Melati T2, Dencarik, Kec. Banjar, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 81152, Indonesia
review 1: Amazing beach front villa with beautiful view. They have 4 bedrooms villas with kitchen, pool, and beautiful garden. Located at Banjar Singaraja Bali
review 2:
Despite the fact that the beach was really not clean (it had been raining severely), the first night we could not sleep because the room was full of mosquitoes, we had to pay 1 eur for the water dispenser bottle (?) and the manager (on WhatsApp) was not very friendly / emphatic, I would strongly recommend the place for a calm getaway.
The service is fantastic. The property is quite new and well mantained (no charm though) and the location is breathtaking
review 3: A great place well located. Staff are awesome and the ladies cook the most awesome food at your request. Highly recommended.
review 4: The Best place I've stayed in my 8 trips to Bali. Beautiful grounds. Wonderful staff. And a view that won't leave your memory for a very long time!
review 5: The perfect escape for those who don't like to stay in a busy city or traffic. Situated right on the edge of the black-sand beach of Dencarik Village.

name: Villa Bahagia
address: Unnamed Road, Dencarik,, RX9H+6JV, Dencarik, Kec. Banjar, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 81152, Indonesia
review 1: What a wonderful stay we had. The staff is superb, clean and on call. Excellent chef, meals cooked kids cared for. Highly recommended, look no further.
review 2: Le Mirage Villa Santai owners live this villa also. A seaside villa beautifully appointed & decorated.

name: Villa Beranda
address: Jl. Lotus No.M15, Dencarik, Kec. Banjar, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 81152, Indonesia
review 1: Quite place, so peaceful. Little bit unmanaged such as I think they didn't change the sheets. For reminding you, no amenities available so bring your own amenities. Kitchen set are complete and working properly.
review 2: Quiet and a great place to relax/chill, and also get work done. Wifi a bit spotty (not a problem for vacation more, bit tricky for work mode); easy fix was our own data and hotspot.
review 3: Friendly staff. Not private during the day. A real Instagram video if that‚Äôs what your looking for.

name: Villa Insulinde
address: Jalan Lotus M9, Dencarik, Banjar, Buleleng Regency, Bali 81152, Indonesia
review 1:
Thanks to this magical villa our Bali trip became lovely. We stayed for 10 days and during our stay we spent most of the time in the villa since we didn't need to cook anything or buy anything, it was handled by the staff. Speaking about the staff, they ware so kind and helpful. The 2 girls that cooked every meal for us and cleaned the whole house was so good and meticulous. They cooked fantastic balinese food (since that was what we wanted), but they were also able to cook european food. The gardeners came every morning and fixed the sun beds, the outdoor dining area and the whole garden. When we woke up everything was in order and we could enjoy a nice breakfast with egg, bacon, pancakes, bread, fresh fruit, freshly squeezed juice and coffee (we brought our own nespresso capsules). When we wanted to go on some kind of trip the staff called a cab. It took 30 minutes at the most and costed almost nothing. When we went on the dolphin trip, a small boot picked us up just outside the villa- one of many benefits of living right by the sea.
I highly recommend you to visit the villa if your looking for a magical, calm vacation. Best regards family dahlberg
review 2:
Perfect place for perfect holidays.

The vila is absolutely wonderful, the place is amazing. the staff very nice.
one of the most beautiful villa I know.

Thierry
review 3: We can surely agree on the review of Thierry:)

name: Villa Kupu Kupu
address: Jl. Tulip No. L No.4, Temukus, Kec. Banjar, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 80572, Indonesia
review 1: we were privileged to use this amazing villa for 1 night. the villa is very tastefully decorated so that you immediately get a home feeling. inside you lack nothing. 3 beautiful bedrooms with air conditioning, each with its own bathroom. outside a swimming pool and several separate seating areas where you can enjoy the sound of the sea and the tranquility of northern bali
review 2: Best place but beach are not clean but house so beautiful and pool too
review 3: Great villas at part of lovina . With view lovina beach

name: Villa HI-KU-ME
address: Jl. Lotus No.No.8, Dencarik, Kec. Banjar, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 81152, Indonesia

name: Warung Siobak Dexwi
address: RX7G+76M, Dencarik, Banjar, Buleleng Regency, Bali 81152, Indonesia
review 1: the food was delicious and cheap...the owners were soo kind and humble

name: Villa Bali Paradijs
address: Jl Lotus M11, Dencarik, Kec. Banjar, Kabupaten Buleleng, Bali 15418, Indonesia
review 1:
We've just had an incredible 6 nights here. There isn't much to say because there's nothing really to fault. It's the ultimate paradise... It also helped that there wasn't a single Southern Cross tattoo in sight.

Made, our rockstar house manager, went above and beyond every day to ensure we were looked after... Such a beautiful soul.
We had many great conversations with her and felt.

We have found our favourite spot in Bali and can't wait to return.
review 2: Super place to stay, very comfortable, good price, amazing views and spotlessly clean! Just on the beach, but with a nice swimming pool. Great rooms and very friendly people! Can recommend it to anyone, especially for longer stay!

name: M.E Bali Villa
address: RX8F+782, Dencarik, Banjar, Buleleng Regency, Bali 81152, Indonesia
